function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to update virtual representation based on changes in the physical system","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate security measures for digital twin data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Static data collection in simulation model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of multiple queues in simulation model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dynamic real-time adaptation in simulation models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of simulation models in healthcare for testing alternate scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importance of data collection for reliability of vaccination process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential inefficiencies in the real service process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability of virtual model","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing investment in industry 4.0 technology due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iot technologies for data collection and analysis during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time data analysis for pandemic prediction and patient monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases spreading through contact with shared wearable rfid readers and tags","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical interaction with assembly line equipment and devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination coverage leading to continued virus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient mass vaccination infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Logistic challenges vulnerable to disease transmission, as evidenced by cases of covid-19 transmission in zurich and india.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus-laden surfaces in the office, such as elevator keys, doorknobs, keyboards, and electrical switches, are prominent modes of disease transfer.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in office environments increases the risk of airborne virus transmission due to the presence of micror espiratory droplets.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employee preference for covid-19 guidelines across countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific ventilation guidelines for assembly line workers","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of regulations in bringing about behavioral changes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient
